meanings.definition: The state or quality of being slushy.
meanings.sent1: The slushinesses of the snow made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the slushinesses of the mud seeping into my shoes.
meanings.sent3: The slushinesses of the ice cream made it melt quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her painting captured the slushinesses of the slushy snow perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The slushinesses of the slush made it look like a colorful, melting rainbow.

meanings.sent1: The slushinesses of the snow happened quickly after the temperature rose.
meanings.sent2: The slushinesses of the ice cream occurred as it sat out in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The slushinesses of the drink increased as the ice cubes melted.
meanings.sent4: The slushinesses of the river formed as the snow melted in the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The slushinesses of the popsicle started when it was left out in the sun.

meanings.sent1: The slushinesses of the slush made it perfect for making snowballs.
meanings.sent2: The slushinesses of the mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent3: The slushinesses of the smoothie made it refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The slushinesses of the slush puppy was a treat on a warm summer afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The slushinesses of the snow cone dripped down my hand on a hot day.
